channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Indie helps the pals rehome a lost bee in 'The Hunt for the Hidden Hive', then in 'The Trouble of the Toppled Trees', Sam and Kit try to uncover who has been chewing the forest trees. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A runaway train must be stopped in 'Pups Save the Dizzy Dust Express', then in 'Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers', Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops. (S8, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta takes flight on a toy plane in 'Pups Save a High-Flying Hen', then in 'Pups Save a Sloth', Mayor Humdinger mistakes a sloth for a monkey, and races the Paw Patrol to find it. (S10, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups' wildlife adventure hops away in 'The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari', then in 'The Crew Plays In The Construction Games', Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew! (S2, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Meatball Mayhem: When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of \"grow spice\" onto a meatball, it grows to enormous size and rolls away! Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop it. (S4, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Planes, Trains, and Kitty Balloons!: Gabby unboxes a passport-like travel book and three tickets that take her on a dollhouse travel adventure. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Camping Out: Holly is going on a camping trip with Ben and his mum and dad, but they are soon joined by annoying Mr Gnome, who is always hungry and sings silly songs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dinner Party: Snooty King and Queen Marigold invite themselves round for dinner to King and Queen Thistle's castle to sample Nanny Plum's cooking. Nanny tries hard to cook special modern food.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Someone's snatching all the fruit in 'The Mysterious Fruit Thief', then in 'The Riddle of the Wrestling Lizards', the agents try to bring some peace to a pair of brawling gila monsters. (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger tricks Katie into watching his kitties in 'Pups Save Katie and Some Kitties', and in 'Pups Save Helo Humdinger', Mayor Humdinger swipes one of Ryder's early inventions. (S9, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roller Disco: Madame Gazelle has organised a roller disco for the children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Guinea Pigs: Peppa looks after Madame Gazelle's guinea pigs Ginger and Brian while she goes on holiday, but prove to be more trouble for Mummy and Daddy Pig than they think.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Club House; Detective Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Factory: The Elf Factory is deep down in the roots of The Great Elf Tree. It is almost Christmas time and the elves are busy making toys. Some magic saves the day when there is a problem.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mrs Witch: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Joke Day: Holly and Ben help the Wise Old Elf play a trick on Nanny Plum for Elf Joke Day, but she does not see the funny side, and gets her revenge by turning the Wise Old Elf into a giant snail.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Move To Music: Madame Gazelle is getting Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London for the day and get a tour by The Queen herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Simple Science: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: School Project: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bubbles; Emily Elephant; Polly's Holiday; Teddy's Day Out; Mysteries; George's Friend; Mr. Scarecrow; The Time Capsule: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Polly's Holiday; Teddy's Day Out; Mysteries; George's Friend; Mr. Scarecrow; The Time Capsule: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo! (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: There's a special photo wall in the park in 'Paddington's Favourite Hero', then in 'Paddington And The Skateboarder', Mateo helps Paddington to become a heroic skateboarder. (S3, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A special spooky play is planned in 'Paddington and the Cursed Halloween Show', then in 'Paddington saves the Mooncake Festival', Taylor the lifeguard arrives in Windsor Gardens. (S3, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Taylor reveals its his birthday, but how can his friends make it special when they had no idea? It's Burn's Night and Mrs Bird teaches Paddington about a rare creature called a Wild Haggis.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Spooky Clubhouse; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus; Happily Ever After; Singing Lesson: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a High Flying Skye: When Corny runs away from Farmer Al's Farm during a blackout, the pups need to light the way to get them home safely.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Go for the Gold: Uncle Otis is hurling down Jake's Mountain in a runaway mine car! Ryder and the Pups need to rescue him before it crashes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Browns go to the beach in 'Paddington's Summer Holiday Begins', then in 'Paddington's Life Guard Training', Paddington, Jonathan and Judy rescue Mr Brown with lifeguard Taylor's help. (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Something is making strange noises in 'Paddington's Mysterious Cave Discovery', and in 'Paddington and the Fossil Hunt', Judy wants to find a fossil on the beach, but isn't having any luck. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger runs for Mayor of Adventure Bay in 'Pups Save Election Day', then in 'Pups Save the Bubble Monkeys', a group of monkeys find themselves in sticky bubble trouble! (S7, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Yumi's bees go missing from her farm in 'Pups Save the Honey', and in 'Pups Save Mayor Goodway's Purse', Mayor Goodway's purse disappears along with its precious cargo - Chickaletta! (S6, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups' wildlife adventure hops away in 'The Crew Builds A Kangaroo Safari', then in 'The Crew Plays In The Construction Games', Speed Meister challenges Rubble & Crew! (S2, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Big Red Chicken's magic makes everything wacky in 'Wonky Wishing Wand', then in 'Bip Bip's Big Show', Dora gets Bip Bip to his concert with Tico. (S1, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Scaredy Smurf would like a dragon in 'I Want a Dragon', then in 'Magic Meltdown', an abandoned cauldron takes revenge. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Detectives: When things start to mysteriously disappear around the dollhouse, Gabby and Pandy play detectives. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Power Tyres!: When his tyres get popped, Blaze thinks he's out of the race. Luckily, Gabby is there with some Power Tyres - high-tech wheels that can transform into anything Blaze needs! (S4, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Eddie and Emmy cause trouble in 'Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch', and then in 'Pups Save a Lonely Ghost', Rubble dreams that he meets a ghost and tries to help it to make new friends. (S9, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A baby T-Rex gets lost in 'Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke', then in 'Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf', Everest joins the patrol for a visit to the jungle, and makes friends with a clumsy calf. (S9, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Kiddie Workout: At playgroup, Madame Gazelle has invited Mr Potato to lead Peppa and her friends in a wonderfully fun musical.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Cars: First, Peppa and her friends visit the Little Cars play centre, where Miss Rabbit is in charge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Families; The Owl: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Trees; Canoe Trip: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Rocket: After seeing a toy Elf rocket, the King orders a real rocket to fly to the moon. Elf honour is at stake and the Elves make a rocket in record time! (Part 1 of 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Picnic On The Moon: The visitors land on the Moon and begin to explore. They meet some friendly aliens and have fun making sandcastles and sharing their picnic. (Part 2 of 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Pet: The Twins really want a pet and Nanny Plum sets about getting them one. She magics them up Pippin the hamster. The Wise Old Elf even brings Pippin a hamster wheel.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Picnic: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Acorn Day: It's autumn and the Elves and Nanny Plum are busy clearing up all the leaves. Suddenly the squirrels arrive with a mission to store acorns in the Great Elf Tree. Acorn Day has arrived.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Digi and Tal's inventions go haywire in 'Pups Save a Runaway Robo-Chicken Purse', then in 'Pups Save the Buggy Trekkers', Humdinger squeezes himself into the dune buggy race. (S10, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Mini Patrol and the Pups race the rain in 'Pups Save the Chalk Art', then in 'Pups Save the Hot Potato', Farmer Al and Yumi's garden is full of holes and a unique potato is missing. (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: DJ Catnip Gets His Groove Back: The Gabby Cats must help DJ Catnip get his groove back. (S1, ep 24).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A Day With Doctor Hamster; Playgroup Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bowling; Swimming Lesson: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Night Lights: Thomas and Nia play with spare lights, excited to stay up all night to test them. But James thinks that goofing is a waste of time and is much too busy. (S27, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cruise Ship Holiday: Peppa and George go on a cruise with Granny and Grandpa Pig. It's supposed to be relaxing, but Peppa and Grandpa Pig get lost.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Holiday on the Sea: There are lots of activities to do on the cruise, like breakfast at the pirate cafe! There, they meet Pirate Pete and Mrs Mermaid who invite everyone to their show.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Begonia, Lily, and Blossom teach Wild a lesson in 'Wild Gets Tamed', then in 'The Yummyus Pie', Chef is worried when the main ingredient for his famous Equinox pie is late blooming. (S2, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A bee frightens some elephants in 'Pups Save The Hiding Elephants', then in 'Pups Save a Yodeler', Wingnut runs away from wolves and ends up trapped in a canyon. (S8, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Wally the Walrus searches for Cap'n Turbot in 'Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus', then in 'Pups Save the Hummy Gummies', Mayor Humdinger is jealous of Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats. (S8, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups look up to find a solution in 'The Crew Builds A Rooftop Stage', then in 'The Crew Fixes The Lighthouse', Speed Meister takes over the lighthouse! (S2, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Officer Blaze: Blaze and AJ join the police department! With the help of their new pal Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a police car to lend a helping hand to any truck in trouble. (S4, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby, I Shrunk the Kitties: Gabby and Pandy accidentally get turned teeny-tiny when one of Mercat's potions spills. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Submarine: Ben and Holly set out to rescue Redbeard the Elf Pirate's sunken treasure. Mr Elf steers the Elf Submarine to the bottom of the lake, but then they are gobbled up by Big Bad Barry.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Visiting The Marigolds: Everyone is visiting snooty King and Queen Marigold's Castle. King and Queen Marigold give them a tour, which is not without a few mishaps.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Bill and Jill's satellite van has a hole in it in 'The Case of the Big Chomp', and in 'The Secret of the Salt Cave', Sam and Kit investigate the shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The pups reunite a baby caribou with his family in 'Pups Save a Baby Caribou', then in 'Pups Save Luke and His Luke-Alike', Luke Stars gets blown away in a tumbleweed. (S10, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Paper Games: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds; Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: King Thistle's New Clothes: Snooty King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit, but when the King's new clothes get dirty Nanny cleans them, along with the King's old clothes - and shrinks them all.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf School: Holly and Nanny Plum join Ben at Elf School, where the Wise Old Elf tells them that strictly no magic should be used. Holly finds it difficult until Nanny uses a little magic to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Golf Course: A mole disturbs King Thistle's Golf Course, so a gnome is enlisted to help drive it away. Soon though the gnome is turning the King's golf course into a crazy golf course.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Morning Noon And Night: The Wise Old Elf teaches the elf children how to tell the time using a watch, while Nanny Plum would much rather use a dandelion clock to teach the fairy children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Police: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig's Book: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Zoo: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Another ton of fun with Peppa, including the stories Tiny Creatures, Daddy Pig's Office, Pirate Island, George Catches a Cold, The Balloon Ride, George's Birthday, Pretend Friend, and Painting.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Who is Paddington's Special visitor that Jonathan and Judy have helped come from afar? // It's the last night of Hanukkah and Mr Gruber's Hanukkiah breaks before he can light the final candle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The Windsor Ruby is missing in 'Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case!', then in 'Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe', the Browns set up a takeaway, but it's hard work! (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A game between England and Peru causes 'Paddington's Football Dilemma', then in 'Paddington Has To Say Goodbye', it's time for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still one more adventure. (S3, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.title: Paw Patrol

channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Cat Burglar: It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat the Bandit: More friendly adventures in Gabby's Dollhouse. (S1, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose in 'Pups vs. A Neon Humdinger', then in 'Pups Save A Royal Painting', Sweetie tries to replace a painting of the Princess. (S8, ep 11).

channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny X straps on a rocket booster in 'Pups Stop A Rocket-Powered Pogo Stick', then in 'Pups Save the Sky-High Stunt Show', Francois' stunt goes horribly awry. (S11, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Igloo: It's a snowy day and Peppa's family build an igloo for their snowman. They then hide away in it during the snowstorm, but Penny Polar Bear and her parents love snowstorms and Peppa's igloo too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.desc: The Party: It's the twins' birthday party and chaos ensues when their little friends arrive. The Wise Old Elf tries to entertain them, but they turn him into a mouse.

channel.desc: Giants in the Meadow: Lucy's dad is digging up the meadow and the Little Kingdom is in danger.

channel.desc: Mrs Fig's Magic School: Despite protests from the Wise Old Elf, Ben accompanies Holly to her first day at magic school.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy's Playgroup: After the disappearance of Mrs Fotheringill, Mrs Elf becomes the twins' new teacher.

channel.desc: No Magic Day: For an entire day the Kingdom has to make do without help from magic.

channel.desc: Spies: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A submarine is heading for a delicate reef in 'Aqua Pups Save the Reef', then in 'Aqua Pups Stop a Giant Squid', the Aqua Pups must save the Merpups' golden orb. (S9, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta has super powers in 'Pups Save a Giant Chicken', then in 'Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze', Harold Humdinger puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so that he can become mayor. (S6, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: CatRat's Puzzle Hunt: The Gabby Cats have set up a puzzle hunt in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy solve riddles, look for clues and complete puzzle challenges. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: For Love of Muddy: When the engines take on a muddy job, Kana is given the best job on a fast clean route, until she realises that she would rather use her skills in another way. (S27, ep 20).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games: Miss Rabbit gives Peppa and friends a tennis lesson, but the tennis balls get everywhere! So, the children play badminton instead and it's a lot easier. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Bubble goes on an adventure with Firefly in 'Wobbly Tooth', then in 'The Darkest Night', Gargamel creates a switch that can turn off all the lights so that he can find the Smurf village. (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The pals search for who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home in 'The Case of the Blue Bandit', then in 'The Honey Badger Break-In', Sweetie sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Pirates Alex, Julia, Julius and Chick-arr-letta get lost in 'Pups Save the Land Pirates', then in 'Pups Save the Birdwatching Turbots', a bird-watching contest leaves us up in the air. (S6, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped in 'Pups Save a Trophy', then in 'Pups Save the Wind Trekkers', Humdinger's mum Helga loses her son's phony trophy, and the Paw Patrol rescue her. (S9, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Speed Meister sabotages the Sierra Sparkle show in 'The Crew Builds A Solar-Powered Bus', then in 'The Crew Builds A Lifeguard Tower', the pups make the beach safe! (S2, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure: Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them! (S5, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Doodle Book: Gabby unboxes some crayons and a colouring book with the same doodle on every page. But when CatRat gets stuck inside the book, Gabby and Pandy must go on a doodle rescue! (S2, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Hard Times: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A baby T-Rex gets lost in 'Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke', then in 'Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf', Everest joins the patrol for a visit to the jungle, and makes friends with a clumsy calf. (S9, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day. (S7, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caravan Friends: After Peppa and family visit a tourist spot with her new friend Birgit Bear, the caravan unhooks from the car! Luckily, the bear family stop it just in time. (S7, ep 26).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Boomerang: The holiday is coming to an end but there's still time to play with a Boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby. They all have trouble keeping the boomerang under control, though.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hollywood; School Bus Trip; Rebecca Rabbit; Nature Trail; Pen Pal; Granny and Grandpa's Attic; The Quarrel; The Toy Cupboard: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Rebecca Rabbit; Nature Trail; Pen Pal; Granny and Grandpa's Attic; The Quarrel; The Toy Cupboard: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Heady Humdinger: Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine: Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach home in time! (S5, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Pandy's Birthday: It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We see a strange land where Chickaletta is royalty in 'Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck', then in 'Pups Save a Desert Flounder', Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm drops hailstones that hatch into baby space rocks in 'Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks', and in 'Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys', a 3D printer leads to pranks all over Adventure Bay. (S9, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Meteor Madness: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower from the mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Pest Friends Forever: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still! (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help Grandpa bowl a strike in 'The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley', then in 'The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path', a flower-friendly footpath saves the day. (S2, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam tries to blend in with a tough clan of hyenas in 'The Undercover Hyena', and in 'The Stranger in the Burrow', underground creatures start getting spooked by the burrow's new addition. (S1, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Clumsy decides that the sky is the place to be in 'Flying Ace', then in 'Lab Assistant', when Brainy gets hurt, Papa Smurf asks Monkey to take Brainy's place as his assistant. (S1, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington hurts his knee in 'Paddington Visits the Doctor', then in 'Paddington and the Sleep Over', Mr. Brown's sleepover needs to be great when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night! (S2, ep 16).

channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's School: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps with an egg in 'Paddington's Hatching Surprise', then in 'Paddington the Best Bear', Paddington wishes that he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Meteor Madness: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower from the mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Pest Friends Forever: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still! (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby Gets the Hiccups: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures to make them go away. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice in 'Crashing Gargamel's Party', then in 'The Curse of the Smurfs' Treasure', Farmer and Vanity unearth an unlucky magical chest! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Farmer's snails go on strike in 'The Snail Whisperer', and then in 'Smurfs Might Fly', The Smurfs prepare for their sarsaparilla banquet, unaware that Gargamel has enchanted the thicket. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Ruff-Ruff Pack take a bus on a wild jump in 'Rescue at Twisty Top Mesa', and in 'Pups Save A Sneezy Chase', Chase's cat allergies lead him to the desert and he's trapped with the pack. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger builds a mechanical rain cloud in 'Pups vs the Hum-Cloud', then in 'Pups Stop the Mid-Air Magnet', Otis gets a powerful magnetic drone. (S11, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all in the wrong place, and a series of wacky misadventures ensues. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Funny Music; Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Marble Run; Grandpa Pig's Metal Detector: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Shooting Star: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's Magic Test: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Olly is entrusted with Chef's special cornbread pan in 'Chili & Cornbread', and then in 'Layer Cake', Chef tries to make a record breaking cake. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny X straps on a rocket booster in 'Pups Stop A Rocket-Powered Pogo Stick', then in 'Pups Save the Sky-High Stunt Show', Francois' stunt goes horribly awry. (S11, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: World Book Day: For World Book Day, the playgroup must dress up as a character from their favourite book. But Peppa can't decide which as she has so many favourites.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Children's Festival: Peppa and her family attend the children's festival and enjoy lots of singing, dancing, crafts and listening to stories.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Muddy Festival; Strawberries: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm. (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo! (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Holly: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.
